home.heroSubtitle: Fast, reliable rides wherever you go, now on iOS and Android.
home.whyChooseUsDesc: Experience a seamless journey with features designed for your comfort and safety.
home.quickRidesDesc: Get to your destination faster with our optimized routing and network of drivers.
home.safeSecureDesc: Your safety is our priority. All drivers are vetted and all rides are tracked in real-time.
home.futuristicInterfaceDesc: A sleek, modern interface designed for an intuitive and effortless booking experience.
home.support247Desc: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist you with any inquiries.
home.downloadAppDesc: Join thousands of satisfied riders and experience the future of transportation.
home.review1: An incredibly reliable and sleek app. The futuristic interface is a joy to use, and I always feel safe during my rides. Highly recommended!
home.review2: Finally, a ride-hailing app that gets it right. Fast, affordable, and the 24/7 support is a lifesaver. I use it for my daily commute.
home.review3: The app's design is just beautiful. So clean and easy to book a ride. It feels like a premium service from start to finish.

features.title: Our Core Features
features.subtitle: Discover the elements that make every ride with us a premium, safe, and seamless experience. We've designed our service with your needs in mind.
features.quickRidesDesc: Get to your destination faster than ever. Our intelligent dispatch system connects you with the nearest available driver, while our optimized routing technology navigates through the quickest paths, saving you precious time on every journey.
features.safeSecureDesc: Your safety is our top priority. All drivers undergo rigorous background checks and vehicle inspections. Every ride is tracked in real-time, and you can share your trip status with loved ones for added peace of mind.
features.futuristicInterfaceDesc: Experience our sleek, modern, and intuitive app interface. Designed for an effortless booking experience, you can set your destination, see your fare estimate, and book a ride in just a few taps. It's premium transportation at your fingertips.
features.support247Desc: We're here for you, day or night. Our dedicated customer support team is available around the clock to assist you with any questions or concerns. Whether it's a question about a fare or help with a lost item, we're just a message away.

pricing.title: Fair & Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: No surprises. See how your fare is calculated before you book a ride. Your price is based on a few key factors.
pricing.distanceDesc: The length of your journey from pickup to destination is a primary component of your fare.
pricing.timeDesc: We account for the estimated duration of the ride, including potential traffic conditions.
pricing.demandDesc: Prices may adjust during busy times to ensure a driver is always available when you need one.
pricing.baseRatesDesc: Our transparent pricing structure ensures you always know what you're paying for.
pricing.perKilometerDesc: Charged for every kilometer traveled during your ride
pricing.perMinuteDesc: Charged for every minute spent in the vehicle
pricing.exampleFaresDesc: To give you a better idea, here are some estimated costs for typical routes in Montenegro. Actual prices may vary.
pricing.readyToRideDesc: Download the app and get moving in minutes. Your next ride is just a tap away.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Fill out the form below or use one of our alternative contact methods to reach us.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.alternativeMethodsDesc: If you prefer not to use the form, you can reach us through these channels.
contact.faq1: How do I reset my password?
contact.faq1Answer: You can reset your password by tapping the "Forgot Password" link on the login screen of the app.
contact.faq2Answer: Fares are based on distance, time, and current demand. You can view our detailed Pricing page for more information.
contact.faq3: Can I schedule a ride in advance?
contact.faq3Answer: Yes, our app allows you to schedule a ride up to 30 days in advance for your convenience.
contact.faq4: What areas do you serve in Montenegro?
contact.faq4Answer: We currently serve Podgorica, Budva, Kotor, Cetinje, Herceg Novi, Ulcinj, and Bar with plans to expand to more cities.
contact.faq5: How do I become a driver?
contact.faq5Answer: Visit our driver application page or contact us directly to learn about driver requirements and the application process.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: Rivora ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our ride-hailing service and mobile application.

personalInfoItems.item1: Name, email address, and phone number
personalInfoItems.item2: Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)
personalInfoItems.item4: Driver's license and vehicle information (for drivers)

locationInfoItems.item1: Real-time location data for ride matching and navigation

usageInfoItems.item1: App usage patterns and features used

howWeUseItems.item1: To provide and maintain our ride-hailing services
howWeUseItems.item2: To process payments and manage your account
howWeUseItems.item3: To match you with drivers and optimize routes
howWeUseItems.item4: To communicate with you about rides, promotions, and service updates
howWeUseItems.item5: To improve our services and develop new features
howWeUseItems.item6: To ensure safety and security for all users
howWeUseItems.item7: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms

privacy.infoSharingText: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

infoSharingItems.item1: With drivers to facilitate ride services
infoSharingItems.item2: With service providers who assist in our operations
infoSharingItems.item3: When required by law or to protect our rights
infoSharingItems.item4: In case of emergency or safety concerns

privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits.

yourRightsItems.item1: Access and review your personal information
yourRightsItems.item3: Delete your account and associated data

privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. Location data is typically retained for 7 days for safety purposes.
privacy.childrensPrivacyText: Our services are not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it.
privacy.internationalTransfersText: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
privacy.changesToPolicyText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using Rivora services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
terms.descriptionText: Rivora is a ride-hailing platform that connects riders with drivers through our mobile application. We provide technology services to facilitate transportation but do not provide transportation services directly.
terms.userAccountsText: To use our services, you must create an account and provide accurate, current, and complete information. You are responsible for:

userAccountsItems.item1: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
userAccountsItems.item2: All activities that occur under your account
userAccountsItems.item3: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use
userAccountsItems.item4: Ensuring your account information remains accurate and up-to-date

terms.userConductText: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You agree not to:

userConductItems.item1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
userConductItems.item2: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
userConductItems.item4: Interfere with the proper functioning of our services
userConductItems.item5: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
userConductItems.item6: Use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose

terms.paymentTermsText: Payment for rides is processed through our secure payment system. You agree to:

paymentTermsItems.item1: Pay all charges for rides you request
paymentTermsItems.item3: Authorize us to charge your payment method
paymentTermsItems.item4: Pay any applicable taxes and fees
paymentTermsItems.item5: Understand that all charges are final and non-refundable except as required by law

driverRequirementsItems.item1: Possess a valid driver's license and vehicle registration
driverRequirementsItems.item3: Pass background checks and vehicle inspections
driverRequirementsItems.item4: Comply with all applicable traffic and safety laws

terms.safetyText: We prioritize the safety of all users. We implement various safety measures including driver background checks, vehicle inspections, and real-time monitoring. However, you acknowledge that transportation involves inherent risks, and you use our services at your own risk.
terms.limitationText: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Rivora shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or use, arising out of or relating to your use of our services.
terms.indemnificationText: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Rivora and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising out of or relating to your use of our services or violation of these terms.
terms.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of our services, to understand our practices.
terms.terminationText: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to our services immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including breach of these terms. Upon termination, your right to use our services will cease immediately.
terms.disputeResolutionText: Any disputes arising out of or relating to these terms or our services shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the laws of Montenegro. You waive any right to participate in a class action lawsuit or class-wide arbitration.
terms.governingLawText: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Montenegro, without regard to conflict of law principles.
terms.changesToTermsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the updated terms on our website. Your continued use of our services after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.contactInfoText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

deleteAccount.title: Request Account Deletion
deleteAccount.subtitle: We're sorry to see you go. Please fill out the form below to request deletion of your account and associated data.
deleteAccount.importantInfoText: Once your account is deleted, all your personal data, ride history, payment information, and other associated data will be permanently removed from our systems. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.processingTimeText: We will process your deletion request within 30 days of receipt. You will receive a confirmation email once your account has been deleted.
deleteAccount.dataDeletionText: All personal information, account data, ride history, payment methods, and any other data associated with your account will be permanently deleted. Some data may be retained for legal or regulatory purposes as required by law.
deleteAccount.emailHelper: Please enter the email address associated with your account
deleteAccount.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
deleteAccount.reasonPlaceholder: Optional: Please let us know why you're deleting your account (this helps us improve our service)
deleteAccount.reasonHelper: This field is optional, but your feedback helps us improve our service
deleteAccount.warningText: Once your account is deleted, you will not be able to recover any of your data or account information. Please make sure you want to proceed before submitting this request.
deleteAccount.submitSuccess: Your deletion request has been submitted successfully. We will process it within 30 days and send you a confirmation email.
deleteAccount.submitError: Failed to submit your request. Please try again or contact support.
deleteAccount.needHelpText: If you have any questions about account deletion or need assistance, please contact us:

driverAgreement.title: Driver Agreement
driverAgreement.introText: This Driver Agreement ("Agreement") governs your relationship with Rivora ("we," "our," or "us") as a driver partner on our platform. By signing up to become a driver, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
driverAgreement.relationshipText: You acknowledge and agree that you are an independent contractor and not an employee, agent, or partner of Rivora. You have no authority to bind Rivora and shall not hold yourself out as an employee, agent, or authorized representative of Rivora.

relationshipItems.item1: You are free to set your own hours and work schedule
relationshipItems.item2: You are responsible for your own taxes and insurance
relationshipItems.item3: You may use other ride-hailing platforms simultaneously
relationshipItems.item4: You are not entitled to employee benefits or protections

driverAgreement.driverRequirementsText: To use our platform as a driver, you must meet and maintain the following requirements:

driverRequirementsItems.item1: Be at least 21 years of age
driverRequirementsItems.item2: Possess a valid driver's license for at least 2 years
driverRequirementsItems.item3: Have a valid vehicle registration and insurance
driverRequirementsItems.item4: Pass a background check and vehicle inspection
driverRequirementsItems.item6: Have a smartphone capable of running our mobile application
driverRequirementsItems.item7: Provide accurate and up-to-date personal and vehicle information

driverAgreement.vehicleRequirementsText: Your vehicle must meet the following standards:

vehicleRequirementsItems.item1: Be a 4-door sedan or larger vehicle
vehicleRequirementsItems.item2: Be no more than 10 years old (exceptions may apply)
vehicleRequirementsItems.item3: Be in good working condition and pass safety inspections
vehicleRequirementsItems.item5: Meet all local and national safety standards

driverAgreement.driverObligationsText: As a driver, you agree to:

driverObligationsItems.item1: Provide safe, professional, and courteous transportation services
driverObligationsItems.item2: Comply with all applicable traffic laws and regulations
driverObligationsItems.item3: Maintain your vehicle in safe and roadworthy condition
driverObligationsItems.item4: Treat all riders with respect and professionalism
driverObligationsItems.item5: Not discriminate against riders based on race, religion, gender, or any other protected characteristic
driverObligationsItems.item6: Not use drugs or alcohol while providing services
driverObligationsItems.item7: Respond promptly to ride requests when you are available
driverObligationsItems.item8: Complete all accepted rides unless there is a valid safety concern

driverAgreement.compensationText: You will receive compensation for completed rides based on our pricing structure. The following applies:

compensationItems.item1: Fares are calculated based on distance, time, and applicable rates
compensationItems.item2: A service fee or commission may be deducted from your earnings
compensationItems.item3: Payment is processed weekly to your designated payment method
compensationItems.item4: You are responsible for all vehicle-related expenses, including fuel, maintenance, and insurance
compensationItems.item5: You are responsible for your own taxes on earnings

driverAgreement.platformUseText: You agree to use our platform only for lawful purposes and in accordance with this Agreement. You agree not to:

platformUseItems.item1: Accept rides outside of the platform or attempt to circumvent our payment system
platformUseItems.item2: Cancel rides without valid reason or engage in fraudulent activity
platformUseItems.item3: Use the platform to transport illegal goods or engage in illegal activities
platformUseItems.item4: Share your account credentials with others
platformUseItems.item5: Manipulate the platform or use automated systems to gain unfair advantage
platformUseItems.item6: Solicit tips or additional payments outside the platform

driverAgreement.safetyText: Safety is our top priority. You agree to:

safetyItems.item1: Maintain appropriate insurance coverage for your vehicle
safetyItems.item2: Report any accidents or incidents immediately
safetyItems.item4: Follow all safety protocols and guidelines provided by Rivora
safetyItems.item5: Ensure your vehicle meets all safety standards

driverAgreement.terminationText: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with or without cause. Rivora may immediately suspend or terminate your access to the platform if you:

terminationItems.item1: Violate any terms of this Agreement
terminationItems.item2: Engage in fraudulent, illegal, or unsafe conduct
terminationItems.item3: Fail to maintain required licenses, insurance, or vehicle standards
terminationItems.item4: Receive multiple complaints or poor ratings from riders

driverAgreement.intellectualPropertyText: All intellectual property rights in the platform, including but not limited to trademarks, logos, and software, remain the exclusive property of Rivora. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the platform solely for the purpose of providing transportation services.
driverAgreement.limitationText: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Rivora shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use of the platform or your provision of transportation services.
driverAgreement.indemnificationText: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Rivora and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising out of or relating to your provision of transportation services, violation of this Agreement, or violation of any applicable laws or regulations.
driverAgreement.disputeResolutionText: Any disputes arising out of or relating to this Agreement shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the laws of Montenegro. You waive any right to participate in a class action lawsuit or class-wide arbitration.
driverAgreement.governingLawText: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Montenegro, without regard to conflict of law principles.
driverAgreement.changesToAgreementText: We reserve the right to modify this Agreement at any time. We will notify drivers of any material changes by posting the updated agreement on our website or through the mobile application. Your continued use of the platform after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Agreement.
